name: Adobe InDesign User Dictionary
summary: Learn about .UDC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: InDesign dictionaries can be accessed by selecting Edit → Preferences → Dictionary in Windows or InDesign → Preferences → Dictionary in Mac OS X. UDC files are often used to share custom dictionaries between multiple users in a company.

description: File used by InDesign, a desktop publishing and page design application; contains a word list used by the software's spell checker; can store exceptions and user-defined words, as well as words from a dictionary.
